[`static var automatic: Chart3DRenderingStyle`](/documentation/charts/chart3drenderingstyle/automatic)Sets the rendering style automatically.[`static var flat: Chart3DRenderingStyle`](/documentation/charts/chart3drenderingstyle/flat)Renders the chart onto a plane.[`static var volumetric: Chart3DRenderingStyle`](/documentation/charts/chart3drenderingstyle/volumetric)Renders the chart volumetrically for binocular vision.## [Relationships](/documentation/Charts/Chart3DRenderingStyle#relationships)
